title: Portkod 1525
overview: Steph and Agnes go to the same school but don't like each other at all. Agnes with probably the best grades in the whole city, and Steph a little more of a bad girl. When their parents start dating during the summer they leave the two girls and Agnes' sister, while going on a trip through Europe. They have to live together in Agnes' apartment together...The second season is set 3 years later and again follows the two girls.
